channel.title: (GoodDistance = true) Help
channel.description: Im using pimpscape and i was wondering how i can get the GoodDistance thing (like when you have to walk to something to mine a rock or cut a tree) to work with a NPC that teleports you some where. I want to use it on the monkey in the training area that teleports you to varrock.

item.title: (GoodDistance = true) Help
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

aight this is easy heres a n example

if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3))

were it says 3 thats how many blocks away u have to be within to do w.e it is

so if its 1 then u have to be right next to it for it to work

Read full topic
